server.DAO

Class SQLServerDAOUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.DAO.AbstractDAOUser
      • server.DAO.SQLServerDAOUser

  • public class SQLServerDAOUser
extends AbstractDAOUser
    This class instantiates the methods relative to the user in SQLServer data base

      • setNewPwd

        public boolean setNewPwd(java.lang.String login,
                         java.lang.String password)
        Checks the DB and asks to set a new password to the client.
        Specified by:
        setNewPwd in class AbstractDAOUser
        Parameters:
        login: - the email of the client. Since it is personal, there can't be two same emails.
        password: - the new client's password.
        Returns:
        true if the change has been successful, false otherwise.
